messages.subject: hypoglycemia
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much for the info.  Reading the lists of symptoms is a real eye-opener for me, I ve had a large number of these things for several years now.  I
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much for the info.  Reading the lists of symptoms is a real eye-opener for me, I've had a large number of these things for several years now.  I had no idea they were all symptoms of LBS.  Of course, they could be unrelated too.  Sigh....I guess I will have to go under the needle to find out for sure!
 
Dia

messages.subject: hypoglycemia
messages.msgSnippet: How were you diagnosed with this?  I have suspected that I have this for a number of years, but due to a doctor phobia have not sought treatment.  I am
messages.messageBody:
How were you diagnosed with this?  I have suspected that I have this for a number of years, but due to a "doctor phobia" have not sought treatment.  I am afraid that I will be poked repeatedly with needles! <g>
 
What I noticed first was that I get a severe headache if I go more than 3 hours without eating.  If I eat, the headache disappears.  I can relate to the other symptoms you listed, but never knew they were signs of LBS.
 
Dia
